alert.note: Alert for Hopkins (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Hopkins County through 300 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Vernon, or 13 miles southwest of Hagansport, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Como, Pine Forest, Tira, Weaver, Flora, Cornersville, Dike and New Birthright. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 130 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
